text: ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. tampit trong ban phdal aoy khnhom nouv amnach muoychamnuon haey ban bangrien khnhom aoy cheh kat soben trong chea mcheasa del ban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei trong chea anak keapear khnhom nowknong lokey nih ning thngai barlok . saum trong me tda aoy khnhom slab knong neam chea anak mou slei m ning banhchoul khnhom tow cheamuoy banda anak del sang ampeu la troemotrauv phng
